class PreProcNodes[source]

PreProcNodes(bids_dir, bids_path_template, bids_ext, RPE_design, sub_list, ses_list, exclude_list=[()])

All nodes in preprocessing pipeline

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
#test
bidsdir = 'data'
sub_list, ses_list, layout = ppt.get_subs(bidsdir)
sub_template = {
                "anat": os.path.join('sub-{subject_id}', 'ses-{session_id}', 'anat', 'sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_T1w.{ext}'),
                "dwi": os.path.join("sub-{subject_id}", "ses-{session_id}", "dwi", "sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_dwi.{ext}",),
                "b_files": os.path.join("sub-{subject_id}", "ses-{session_id}", "dwi", "sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_dwi.bv*")
            }
test_nodes=PreProcNodes(bids_dir=bidsdir, bids_path_template = sub_template, bids_ext = 'nii.gz', RPE_design='-rpe_none', sub_list = sub_list, ses_list = ses_list)

node_names = list(
    [
        'sub_source',
        'sub_grad_files',
        'mrtrix_image',
        'select_files',
        'get_metadata',
        'raw_dwi2mask',
        'dwigradcheck',
        'mrconvert',
        'denoise',
        'ringing_removal',
        'dwifslpreproc',
        'alter_gradient',
        'modify_gradient',
        'update_image',
        'recreate_mask',
        'dwibiascorrect',
        'NewGradient',
        'LowNoiseMap',
        'RicianNoise',
        'NoiseComparison',
        'ConvertRician',
        'dwi2mask',
        'dwi2tensor',
        'tensor2metrics',
        'mrthreshold',
        'dwinormalise',
        'sub_b0extract',
        'sub_mrmath_mean',
        'sub_dwi2mask',
        'sub_dwi2nii',
        'sub_mask2nii',
        'sub_ApplyMask',
        'mni_b0extract',
        'mni_mrmath_mean',
        'mni_dwi2mask',
        'mni_dwi2nii',
        'mni_mask2nii',
        'mni_ApplyMask',
        'MNI_Outputs',
        'datasink'
    ])

for key, value in test_nodes.__dict__.items():
    assert str(value) in node_names
    
# for rpe_all
sub_template = {
                "anat": os.path.join('sub-{subject_id}', 'ses-{session_id}', 'anat', 'sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_T1w.{ext}'),
                "dwi": os.path.join("sub-{subject_id}", "ses-{session_id}", "dwi", "sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_dwi.{ext}",),
                "bfiles": os.path.join("sub-{subject_id}", "ses-{session_id}", "dwi", "sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_dwi.bv*"),
                "rdwi": os.path.join("sub-{subject_id}", "ses-{session_id}", "dwi", "sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_run-2_dwi.{ext}"),
                "rbfiles":os.path.join("sub-{subject_id}", "ses-{session_id}", "dwi", "sub-{subject_id}_ses-{session_id}_run-2_dwi.bv*")
            }
test_nodes=PreProcNodes(bids_dir=bidsdir, bids_path_template = sub_template, bids_ext = 'nii.gz', RPE_design='-rpe_all', sub_list = sub_list, ses_list = ses_list)
node_names = list(
    [
        "sub_source",
        "sub_grad_files1",
        "sub_grad_files2",
        "mrtrix_image1",
        "mrtrix_image2",
        "concat_dwi",
        "concat_grad",
        "select_files",
        "get_metadata",
        "raw_dwi2mask",
        "dwigradcheck",
        "mrconvert",
        "denoise",
        "ringing_removal",
        "dwifslpreproc",
        "alter_gradient",
        "modify_gradient",
        "update_image",
        "recreate_mask",
        "dwibiascorrect",
        "NewGradient",
        "LowNoiseMap",
        "RicianNoise",
        "NoiseComparison",
        "ConvertRician",
        "dwi2mask",
        "dwi2tensor",
        "tensor2metrics",
        "mrthreshold",
        "dwinormalise",
        "sub_b0extract",
        "sub_mrmath_mean",
        "sub_dwi2mask",
        "sub_dwi2nii",
        "sub_mask2nii",
        "sub_ApplyMask",
        "mni_b0extract",
        "mni_mrmath_mean",
        "mni_dwi2mask",
        "mni_dwi2nii",
        "mni_mask2nii",
        "mni_ApplyMask",
        "MNI_Outputs",
        "datasink",
    ]
)
for key, value in test_nodes.__dict__.items():
    assert str(value) in node_names

Creating layout of data directory, might take a while if there are a lot of subjects
Data sink (output folder) is set to ./derivatives
Data sink (output folder) is set to ./derivatives

class ACPCNodes[source]

ACPCNodes(MNI_template)

Freesurfer recon-all nodes

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
#test
test_node = ACPCNodes(MNI_template=os.path.expandvars('$FSLDIR/data/standard/MNI152_T1_1mm.nii.gz'))
node_names = list(
    [
        "freesurfer_sub_id",
        "reduce_FOV",
        "transform_inverse",
        "FLIRT",
        "concat_transform",
        "aff2rigid",
        "apply_warp",
        "FSrecon",
        "fsl_bet",
        "fsl_epireg",
        "transformconvert",
        "mrtransform",
        "mrgrid",
    ]
)
for key, value in test_node.__dict__.items():
    assert str(value) in node_names
